title: Chocolate fudge cake traybake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '175g self raising flour', '4 tablespoons cocoa powder', '160g unsalted butter', '160g golden caster sugar', '2 eggs', '100ml plain yoghurt', '200g plain chocolate, melted', '85ml full fat milk', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', 'For the fudge icing', '100g dark chocolate (70% cocoa solids)', '100g butter', '170g condensed milk', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '120g crushed chocolate biscuits (optional)']
